children.text: The walkway required to be provided from the access opening across to the heating unit is incomplete.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 5601 Gas Installations, clause 5.3.11 Appliances in Roof Spaces, requires that
‘A walkway is to be provided from the access point to the appliance and shall extend around the appliance to the point where access may be required for lighting or servicing’
‘Access can be gained without hazard or undue difficulty for inspection, repair, renewal or operational purposes’ .

The present walkway needs to be completed to provide access for the servicing of the heater without undue difficulty from the edge of the access opening across to the heater platform in accordance with these requirements.
